alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:40PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Developing widely scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of western Prowers, northwestern Baca, southeastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 135 PM MDT, scattered thunderstorms were developing from eastern Las Animas County and western Baca County northeastward into north- central Prowers County. This corridor of activity is nearly stationary, however individual storms are moving northeastward around 30 to 35 mph. HAZARD...Very isolated wind gusts up to 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Granada, Pritchett, Kim and Bristol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts may occur well away from precipitation or lightning.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
